notice: Before ordering please make sure that my commissions are open! (you can check the status on the
agree: And that you've read and agree to my

importan-info.title: INFORMATION YOU NEED TO KNOW:
importan-info.money: You should send the money before start the commission
importan-info.date: If you need the commission for a specific date and you do not want to wait, you can pay an extra pay of 100€
importan-info.contact: Also you can contact me in:

beggin.title: BEGGINING
beggin.info: You will send me the necessary images and references to make the commission. (With more references and the more detailed the information,  will be better the results)

waiting.title: WAITING LIST
waiting.info: Once the payment has been made, you will enter  in a waiting list in which you will be given an approximate date to deliver the illustration. (Exceptions with extra payment.)

sketch.title: SKETCH
sketch.info: The sketch is started and sent to the client. (At this stage you can change poses / shape / color ...)

end.title: FINAL RESULT
end.info: Only simple details can be changed; the color or small details. The commission will be sent by email.

send-email: Send the filled out form to my email/twitter or discord:
footer: I won't draw mechas or complex designs/backgrounds. Everything else is okay but you can also ask me if you're unsure ♥
